meanings.definition: To cause harm or injury to
meanings.sent1: Not wearing a helmet while biking can damnifies your head.
meanings.sent2: The reckless driver damnifies others by speeding through red lights.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy can damnifies your teeth, so remember to brush!
meanings.sent4: Procrastination can damnifies your chances of success like a slow poison.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring safety precautions can damnifies your well-being in unexpected ways.

meanings.sent1: Leaving the window open during a storm damnifies the carpet with water damage.
meanings.sent2: The company damnifies its reputation by failing to deliver on promises.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to save your work can damnifies your progress on the project.
meanings.sent4: Lack of maintenance can damnifies the lifespan of your car engine.
meanings.sent5: Skipping meals can damnifies your health over time, so remember to eat regularly.
